questions.question: A contract's communication must lean toward _________ communication.

questions.question: Which of the following modes of communication is best suited to a work breakdown structure?

questions.question: The process of collecting and distributing performance information, including status reports, progress measurements, and forecasts, is known as:

questions.question: You have just taken over a project in execution. During your first week, you determine that the project team members spend much time responding to unexpected information requests from different stakeholders. Because of these interruptions, the team cannot focus on their activities, so the project is behind schedule. What should you do first?
options: Tell the team members to stop responding to unexpected requests since it is not the responsibility of the team
Push the team to respond to all the requests faster so that they can perform their assigned project activities on time
Ask the team to forward all stakeholder inquiries to you so that the team members can focus on their assigned tasks
Review the communications management plan to understand how stakeholder requests should be handled
questions.explanation: The communications management plan outlines how project stakeholders should exchange information. By reviewing this plan, the project manager can understand how stakeholder requests should be handled and can then make necessary adjustments to ensure the team can focus on their project activities.

questions.question: A project manager communicates via email with team members, internal and external project stakeholders. The project manager incorporates specific techniques to reduce misunderstandings when composing his emails. Which of the following is not considered one of these techniques?
options: Clear purpose directed to the needs of the reader
Controlled flow of words and ideas
questions.explanation: A communications register is not a technique used when composing emails. It is a document used to track and manage project communications, not a technique for reducing misunderstandings in email communication.

questions.question: A project is underway to install solar panels in a remote desert location. options: Adapting to the harsh weather conditions
questions.explanation: Given that the project management software will coordinate activities and daily updates will be provided online, reliable internet access is the most likely challenge in a remote desert location.
